basis for you providing personal information and special categories of personal information partly comes from a statutory requirement, partly from a contractual requirement under your employment contract, and partly from a need for the information to carry out the employment relationship with you. In general, you must provide the personal information and special categories of personal information such as your name, surname, date of birth, home address, education and history of employment, PESEL number or ID card number, any of other information about you or your dependents and family members (if such disclosure is required for use of the benefits provided by Labour Law), except when we indicate that certain information is voluntary (e.g., in connection with employee satisfaction surveys). Not providing your personal information and special categories of personal information you are required to provide may prevent EPAM from carrying out the employment relationship with you and, in some circumstances, may require EPAM to terminate your employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
